title: Kenya: story of progress
creator_credit: Government of Kenya and Mercury Film Productions
brief_description: A survey of Kenya (1956) showing the developments taking place in all aspects of life in the territory. Illustrates agricultural and farming progress including the wheat farms, the production of maize, coffee, tea and sisal, the breeding of beef and dairy cattle. Reviews developments in transport and communications, modern health services, housing and education schemes, and the growth of industry and commerce.
